P7V.MU.summary: Photon Energy N.V., through its subsidiaries, provides solar power solutions and services worldwide. The company operates through Energy Solutions; Production of Electricity; FVE Investment; Operations, Maintenance, and PVPP Supervision; and Other segments. It had a portfolio of 69 power plants with an installed capacity of 57.1 MWp. The company is also involved in the design, development, finance, installation, operation, and maintenance of photovoltaic equipment focusing on green-field and rooftop installations. In addition, it offers project development; investment management; project finance; insurance; engineering, procurement, and construction; supervision services; and operations and maintenance services, as well as technology solutions for photovoltaic power plants. Further, the company engages in the import and wholesale of FVE components. Its power solutions provide solar and solar-hybrid power to a range of customers and applications. The company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands.
